message: Let's start with a fair deal.  I'll take 90%, and you get 10%.  This way we both get something, and we can move on to more interesting things.
I think a 60/40 split is fair. It's a good starting point for us to negotiate from.
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not going to give up more than I did in the first round.  Let's split it 70/30, and we can both be happy.
